snippet: From stolen sweets to missing parents, the sleuths in these stories have their work cut out for them.
abstract: Elizabeth Bird reviews books The Great Cake Mystery: Precious Ramotswe's Very First Case by Alexander McCall Smith, Nancy Clancy, Super Sleuth by Jane O'Connor, Ruby Redfort: Look Into My Eyes by Lauren Child, Two Crafty Criminals!: And How They Were Captured by the Daring Detectives of the New Cut Gang by Philip Pullman and Mr and Mrs Bunny - Detectives Extraordinaire! by Polly Horvath.
lead_paragraph: From stolen sweets to missing parents, the sleuths in these stories have their work cut out for them.

headline.seo: The Newest Crop of Sleuths for Kids
